item.title: Fix WooCommerce There Are No Payment Methods Available Error
item.dc:creator: paygate.to
item.description:
When you install a new WooCommerce website, blocks is enabled by default. This will cause most payment methods to stop working showing the message: “There are no payment methods available. This may be an error on our side. Please contact us if you need any help placing your order“. Fixing this issue is very easy: […]

item.title: Allow Your Website To be Displayed or Embedded iframe
item.dc:creator: paygate.to
item.description:
The instant approval payment gateway using sardine.ai infrastructure may redirect your customers back to your website after payment using iframe. However, the default security settings including specifically the X-Frame-Options header, often restrict the ability to embed your site in iframes from different domains. In this comprehensive guide, we’ll explore two approaches to allow iframes on […]

The post Allow Your Website To be Displayed or Embedded iframe appeared first on PayGate.to.

item.title: Facebook Ads Tracking Multiple Domains
item.dc:creator: paygate.to
item.description:
To implement Facebook tracking across multiple domains, including a scenario where the ad redirects users to a landing page on one domain and the purchase is completed on another domain, you can use one of the following methods:Use the Facebook Conversion API to send server-side events to Facebook. The Conversion API allows you to send […]
